item.title: Explainable A.I.
item.description: Contact form is an essential feature of any website. Every website has a contact form to receive some important feedback or suggestions from their potential visitors or customers. Generally, contact forms are made responsive using PHP. But here I will show you simplest way to create an attractive form using only HTML and CSS ! You can find its source code here. The most important factors of any contact forms are GET and POST requests.
